name: MEMOIRE
description:
The game

Take on the role of Louis Lumière who, following an accident, lost much of his memory, just before the revolutionary invention that would change the history of cinema forever. Explore, collect items, craft and try to remember.

Explore

Explore the environments that surround you. Feel free to navigate the environment as you want.

Collect items

Search, find and collect items that are within the various game environments.

Craft

Build the components of the revolutionary invention using the materials you collect.

Development
